participant_1.background:
I am a bit distant from my family, but I try to make time for them every weekend.
I don't wash my clothes as often as I should.
i love to clean.
i drive a fast sports car.
I like to pet my cat to relieve stress and forget about the day.

participant_2.background:
I met my family at a local hiking group.
i have a career in party planning.
i am a graduate student.
i am usually very shy.
i run track.

content.text: Hey, my name is David! How are you doing today?
Hello David, I am doing well. What do you do for a living?
I am a graduate student studying marine biology and I also work part-time as a pet sitter.
That's really cool! I am a professional party planner and I also run track.
That's great! I love to go to parties and I also enjoy running. I have a cat and I love to pet him to relieve stress. What about you?
I love animals! I have three dogs and I love to take them for walks. I also love to go hiking and camping.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love to go hiking too. I met my family at a local hiking group.
That's awesome! I am usually very shy, but I love to meet new people.
I am also pretty shy, but I am getting better at talking to people. I am glad to meet you!
It was nice meeting you too, David!
